job.title: Data Scientist - NLP
job.description: We are seeking a junior/mid-level Machine Learning Engineer with familiarity in Deep Learning Models for NLP. In this role, you will be responsible for the algorithms and models that analyze customer feedback from surveys and reviews. You will apply your practical experience dealing with messy data, your deep understanding of machine learning fundamentals and algorithms, your willingness to write code to explore problems and understand data, and your ability to implement solutions from scratch. Masters in computer science, statistics or related field, with 1-3 years of work experience, or Bachelors degree with 3-5 years experience. Be a part of and work with a small, multidisciplinary and agile team  Build your career with people like you who want to solve problems, and have fun together  Work on adding innovative capabilities to world class Bose business services  Excellent work life balance and a continuous learning environment  Highly competitive package as well as a comprehensive benefits program  Bose is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to inclusion and diversity. We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, or any other legally protected characteristics. For additional information, please review: (1) the EEO is the Law Poster (http://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/pdf/OFCCP_EEO_Supplement_Final_JRF_QA_508c.pdf); and (2) its Supplements (http://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/ofccpost.htm). Please note, the company's pay transparency is available at http://www.dol.gov/ofccp/pdf/EO13665_PrescribedNondiscriminationPostingLanguage_JRFQA508c.pdf.
